# Introduction
This is a introduction


This proposal report is created for Kogan, Australian’s consumer electronic brand that provide wide range of products with aggressive pricing, which they are planning for an opportunity to expand their products to the new market in different country. The chosen country that is recommended for Kogan to expand to is Indonesia with the potential customer based on the large population size in the country. The suited entry strategy for Kogan to utilize is the direct export to the chosen market destination to test the market and the brand ability to gain new customer based and viability for future expansion in the chosen market with almost minimal of investment to entry the market compared to other strategy. Kogan has several points of difference from their marketing strategy that they used and the points of parity as a requirement that they should meet for the purpose of competing in the market and attracting the customers. It is suggested that Kogan should target the customer in the Indonesia’s market who have medium to low-income range as Kogan should deliver the same customer value that they offer in Australia which is mainly affordability product and convenient.
